articles.description: This week, 20 Indian startups have collectively raised around $130 million. This includes four growth-stage and 14 early-stage funding deals

articles.author: Shivangini
articles.title: BPCL, Tata Motors subsidiary signs MoU to set up 7000 EV charging points by 2024 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The location of these EV charging points is going to be determined by using the insights collected from over 1.15 lakh Tata EV users on Indian roads and BPCL's fuel station network.
articles.content: Tata Motors subsidiary, Tata Passenger Electric Mobility Ltd. (TPEM), signed a Memorandum of understanding (MoU) with Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (BPCL) to install 7000 Electric Vehicle (EV)… [+2887 chars]

articles.title: IRCON Share Sale Over-Subscribed; Govt to Get Around Rs 1,100 Crore - News18
articles.description: The share sale would fetch about Rs 1,100 crore to the exchequer
